definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: city (As. loan-word; fr. maḫâzu, city, Asrb:Annals iii.115 and oft.; v. Dl:HWB 271; cf. Targum [[מָחוֹזׇא]] market-place, province, moh.uwzo0 small town)—only cstr. [[וַיַּנְחֵם אֶל־מְחוֹז]] [[חֶפְחָם]] Ps 107:30 and he guided them unto the city of their desire.
